text: Paolo Bussetti was an Italian swimmer. He competed in men's 200 metre backstroke and men's 200 metre freestyle events at the 1900 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing Category:Italian male swimmers Category:Male backstroke swimmers Category:Italian male freestyle swimmers Category:Olympic swimmers of Italy Category:Swimmers at the 1900 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing
title: Paolo Bussetti
